page.title: 17WISBOROUGH GREEN PETS
page.content: These are some of the pets kept by children in Wisborough Green in 1985. Julia - I have two rabbits, one cat and one fish. I used to have four fish but three died and Sooty, our last cat, died too. Thomas - I have two hamsters and two fishes. The finches hop and jump about their cage. James - My daddy made a cage for my rabbit and run so that he could run about. When he was on the grasss he was trying to dig a tunnel to get away but my daddy put it on the patio. I have a dog called Lassie and Denny is my cat. My rabbit is called Smokey. Luke - I have a dog called Lady Jane of Avon. She is a Labrador and she is a good guard dog. Nick - I have 62 woodlice. They have twelve legs I think. I also have two gerbils. They are desert rats.
